page.title: 09LIVING IN FALMOUTH
page.content: The first house built in {FALMOUTH}was Arwenack House it was built in {1657. Grove House was built in {1540}and is the oldest building in {FALMOUTH}. Wood Lane,Arwenack Road and the area around the Parish Church have some of the oldest houses in{FALMOUTH}150 or more years old.I live on {BEACON ROAD} ,which is fairly old.All the houses were built about the same time and they are about 55 years old and they are built of breeze block.Around the corner is {BEACON STREET}they are a lot older than my house.The land my house was built on was the"{FIVE {FIELDS}".It was owned by {MR BROOKES} .The blocks were made up on the { {ELECTRIC WORKS}on the{BEACON}which is no longer there.A builder called { {STRONGMAN}built them.
